ARABIC: وَلِلَّهِ مُلْكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَيَوْمَ تَقُومُ ٱلسَّاعَةُ يَوْمَئِذٍ يَخْسَرُ ٱلْمُبْطِلُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: The kingdom of the heavens and earth belongs to Allah and, on the Day that the Hour arrives, that Day the liars will be lost.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: God's is the kingdom of the heavens and the earth. The day the Hour is proclaimed the liars will be losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Allah's is the kingdom of the heavens and the earth, and on the Day when the Hour (of Resurrection) shall come to pass, the followers of falsehood shall be in utter loss.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: To God belongs the kingdom of the heavens and the earth. On the day when the Hour of Doom arrives, the followers of falsehood will be lost.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And to Allah only belongs the kingship of the heavens and the earth; and when the Last Day is established – on that day the followers of falsehood will suffer loss.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And to Allah belongs the kingdom of the heavens and the earth. And on the Day that the Hour will be established -- on that Day the followers of falsehood shall lose.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And Allah's is the kingdom of the heavens and the earth; and on the day when the hour shall come to pass, on that day shall they perish who say false things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: To God belongs the Kingdom of the heavens and the earth. And on the day when the Hour is come, upon that day the vain-doers shall lose.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And unto Allah belongeth the Sovereignty of the heavens and the earth; and on the day when the Hour riseth, on that day those who follow falsehood will be lost.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: To God belongs the kingdom of the heavens and the earth; on the Day when the Hour comes, those who follow falsehood will be the losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And Allah's is the dominion of the heavens and the earth; and on the Day whereon the Hour arriveth, then shall lose the followers of falsehood.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: To Allah belongs the kingdom of the heavens and the earth, and when the Hour sets in, the falsifiers will be losers on that day.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: To Allah belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth, and the Day that the Hour of Judgment is established,- that Day will the dealers in Falsehood perish!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And to Allah belongs the kingdom of the heavens and the earth. And on the Day that the Hour will be established, on that Day the followers of falsehood (polytheists, disbelievers, worshippers of false deities, etc.) shall lose (everything).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: To Allah belongs the Kingdom in the heavens and the earth. On the Day when the Hour comes, those who disbelieved shall be the losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: To God belongs the kingship of the heavens and the earth. On the Day when the Hour takes place, on that Day the falsifiers will lose.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And to Allah belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth. And the Day the Hour appears - that Day the falsifiers will lose.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [45:27] And to God belongs the kingdom of the heavens and the earth. And on the day when the Hour sets in (yawma taqūmu’l-sā‘atu is substituted by [the following, yawma’idhin]) on that day the followers of falsehood, the disbelievers, will be losers, that is to say, their loss will become manifest by their ending up in the Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And Unto Allah belongeth the Sovereignty) the stores (of the heavens) i.e. rain (and the earth) i.e. vegetation; (and on the day when the Hour riseth) which is the Day of Judgement, (on that day those who follow falsehood will be lost) the idolaters will be losers both for missing the life of the world and the Hereafter.
